posts.title: Wristband Headphones
posts.content: Never misplace your headphones again! With the wristband headphones you’ll be able to keep them handy at all times. They come in a range of fashionable colors and conveniently wrap around your wrist, allowing them to be worn like bracelets.

posts.title: Indoor Basketball Returning Hoop
posts.content: Make sure you never lose your competitive edge by staying sharp using the indoor basketball returning hoop. This authentic plexi-glass hoop can be installed anywhere in the home and lets you stay sharp even when you have no one else to play with.

posts.title: Inflatable Ride On Bull Pool Toy
posts.content: Grab your bathing suit and see if you have what it takes to tame the wildest beast at the aquatic rodeo by hopping on this inflatable ride on bull pool toy. It’s designed using photo-realistic printing technology and made from durable gauge vinyl.

posts.title: Water Temperature LED Faucet
posts.content: Add some high tech style to your home faucet with this temperature sensitive LED Faucet. The color of the lighting changes depending on the temperature of the water that is coming out: blue means the water is cold, and red means the water is very hot.

posts.title: Talkboy Tape Recorder
posts.content: Have loads of 90s styled high tech fun with the talkboy tape recorder from Tiger. Armed with a blank cassette and the speed recorder setting that lets you change your voice, you’ll be able to pull off all kinds of pranks on friends and family.

posts.title: Remote Control Camera Quadrocopter
posts.content: Heavyweight technology and lightweight design combine to bring you the remote control camera quadrocopter. Once behind the controls you’ll be able to fly around town while capturing amazing aerial footage from the 14 megapixel full HD 1080p camera.

posts.title: Floating Fish Dome
posts.content: Get to know the aquatic residents of your pond a little better by having them swim up inside the floating fish dome. When the fish swims up inside the dome, the transparent surface gives you a 360 degree view of the fish as it peeks its head above the surface.

posts.title: Drinking Games Book
posts.content: Turn a run-of-the-mill night into an epic drinking bender with help from the the Drinking Games book. Within its enlightening pages you’ll find 25 of the craziest and most entertaining drinking games known to mankind – you’ll end up completely blitzed before the night is over.

posts.title: Paper Thin Solar Charger
posts.content: Keep your phone running all day without having to lug around a cumbersome charger by juicing it up using the paper thin solar charger. The revolutionary ultra thin and lightweight design allows you to easily place it inside your notebook for unmatched portability.

posts.title: Pink Cadillac Shelf
posts.content: Give your man cave a vintage ’50s feel to it by mounting this pink Cadillac shelf. This icon of automotive history provides a sturdy small glass top to place your stuff and is styled after Elvis Presley’s iconic 1954 pink Cadillac.

posts.title: Truck Hitch Toilet Seat
posts.content: Answer nature’s call even if there isn’t a bathroom in sight by mounting the truck hitch toilet seat onto your trusty ride. This off-road commode easily installs onto your ride to provide a rudimentary yet surprisingly comfortable place to take care of business.

posts.title: Crocodile Isle Inflatable Water Park
posts.content: Transform your backyard into a watery paradise for your little whipper snappers by inflating this crocodile isle water park. It comes with a blower for quick inflation, dual slides, and an ample opening in the middle that can be used as a pool or ball pit.
